elements.content: Components are data driven for easier personalization and scalability.

EmpacJS allows you the ability to create components and pages that are completely driven by data. What this means is that you can create one placement and put it everywhere you like. Anytime you make adjustments to the primary placement, it'll update the same module everywhere it lives. This also means you can provide guidance on what modules you want to show depending on how your customers made it to your website, where in the purchasing process they are, and much more.
